pr_title: Add x-wso2-mutual-ssl extension and change transport extension

timeline.message: Add x-wso2-mutual-ssl extension and change transport extension

timeline.bodyText: can you please confirm extensions.remove() not throw NPE if the key is null. Looks like it does not throw NPE.
timeline.author: ruks

replies.bodyText: if the element is not contained inside the array, it will not do anything. Refer https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/util/ArrayList.html#remove(java.lang.Object). This check is unnecessary
replies.author: AmaliMatharaarachchi
